alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 04 at 9:08PM CDT until April 07 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Black River at Black River Falls affecting Jackson County. .The combination of snow melt and heavy rain will result in minor flooding along the Black River at Black River Falls. The river will rise above 47 foot flood stage on Wednesday evening. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black River at Black River Falls. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 47.0 feet, Some rural roads may begin to flood including county Highway VV downstream near the La Crosse County line. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 46.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday evening to a crest of 47.4 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 47.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 47.0 feet on 03/30/2004. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 1100 AM CDT.
